reasonably.translation[0].definitions[0]: quite or to a satisfactory degree, but not completely
The car is in reasonably good condition.
He’s doing reasonably well at school.
reasonably.translation[0].definitions[1]: in a way that is right or fair
He can’t reasonably be expected to have known that.
reasonably.translation[0].definitions[2]: Despite her anger, she had behaved very reasonably.
